actions.text: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Gibson to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Gibson to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment directs the Secretary of Transportation to develop a comprehensive strategy, within 1 year, to address "structurally deficient" and "functionally obsolete" bridges, as defined by the National Bridge Inventory, and to identify the unique challenges and policy solutions with regard to these respective categories.
purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to develop a comprehensive strategy, within 1 year, to address `structurally deficient' and `functionally obsolete' bridges, as defined by the National Bridge Inventory, and to identify the unique challenges and policy solutions with regards to these respective categories.
